Articles.Content:
This is my first KSP history and English isn't my mother language. Sorry if i miss some words.

Jeb and Bill were sitting in their chairs, in the astronaut complex.

-Hey, Bill! I want to ask you a thing!

-What, Jeb?

-Well... There's any place that our community didn't have gone yet?

-Hm... No, i think...

-Wait! I know one place. The great and powerful Eve!

-Oh, that's right Bob. Let's get some money, join some BOASTERS and we'll go there.

Jeb walked to the wall, picked up his phone, and called Bob.

-Bob?

-Wadd's up, Jeb? Long time don't see ya!

-Bob. Seriously. You look like a retard with these slangs.

-Okay. Sorry.

-I'm planning to go to Eve. It's the only place where we haven't gone yet.

-Seriously? Well... I don't want to! I will be stranded! The gravity there is higher than ours, and the atmosphere, 5x thicker!

-Oh... That's a problem. Then... Grrr! We won't be able to go there. Well, well. We will need to send an unmanned mission.

-Okay! Then i'm in! See you in 30 minutes, ok?

-Okay.

Jeb drops the phone.

-Bill... We'll need a satellite.

-Alright. Let's do it.

Part 2 will be released soon.
